NK002(kha)021:0: sman bla'i sgom bzlas shin tu bsdus pa phan bde'i myur lam zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK002(kha)021:1: na mo gu ru b+hee sha dz+ye r+aa dza ya /
NK002(kha)021:2: 'dir sman bla'i sgom bzlas mdor bsdu pa'i tshul gyis nyams su len par 'dod pas /
NK002(kha)021:3: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la //
NK002(kha)021:4: sogs skyabs sems lan gsum dang /
NK002(kha)021:5: sems can thams cad bde ba dang sogs tshad med bzhi bsgom /
NK002(kha)021:6: swa b+h+aa wa shud+d+hahsarba d+har+m+aahswa b+h+aa wa shud+d+ho&aham /
NK002(kha)021:7: stong pa'i ngang las pad zla'i gdan gyi steng //
NK002(kha)021:8: rang sems h'u yig 'od kyis don gnyis bsgrubs //
NK002(kha)021:9: tshur 'dus bdag nyid bcom ldan sman gyi bla //
NK002(kha)021:10: sku mdog mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
NK002(kha)021:11: phyag g.yas mchog sbyin phyag rgyas a ru ra //
NK002(kha)021:12: g.yon pas mnyam gzhag bdud rtsi'i lhung bzed bsnams //
NK002(kha)021:13: mtshan dpe'i dpal 'bar chos gos rnam gsum gsol //
NK002(kha)021:14: zhabs gnyis rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
NK002(kha)021:15: g.yas su rgyal sras nyi ltar snang byed dmar //
NK002(kha)021:16: phyag g.yon nyi mas mtshan pa'i pad+ma bsnams //
NK002(kha)021:17: g.yon du zla ltar snang byed sku mdog dkar //
NK002(kha)021:18: phyag g.yon zla bas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin //
NK002(kha)021:19: gnyis ka g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya mdzad //
NK002(kha)021:20: dar dang rin chen rgyan rdzogs gtso bo la //
NK002(kha)021:21: 'dud pa'i tshul gyis pad zla'i gdan la bzhengs //
NK002(kha)021:22: gtso 'khor kun gyi gnas gsum 'bru gsum mtshan //
NK002(kha)021:23: de las 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun //
NK002(kha)021:24: bcom ldan sman gyi bla ma'i rnam pa ru //
NK002(kha)021:25: mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa ma dzah dzahh+aum bam hohranga la gnyis med thim //
NK002(kha)021:26: thugs kar zla steng h'u mthar sngags phreng las //
NK002(kha)021:28: sras bcas rgyal pa'i thugs rje byin rlabs kun //
NK002(kha)021:29: tshur 'dus bdag rgyud byin gyis brlab par gyur //
NK002(kha)021:31: b+hee sha dz+ye b+hee sha dz+ye ma h+aa b+hee sha dz+ye r+aa dza sa mud+ga te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)021:33: spro na gzungs ring kyang bzla /
NK002(kha)021:34: mthar bdag bskyed kyi ye shes pa mdun gyi nam mkhar byon pa la /
NK002(kha)021:35: b+hee sha dz+ye r+aa dza sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham sogs kyis mchod /
NK002(kha)021:36: thugs rje kun la snyoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
NK002(kha)021:37: mtshan tsam thos pas ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal sel //
NK002(kha)021:38: dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla //
NK002(kha)021:39: bee d+aur+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)021:40: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa //
NK002(kha)021:41: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi blas //
NK002(kha)021:42: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can thams cad la //
NK002(kha)021:43: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK002(kha)021:44: zhes bstod cing gsol ba gdab la /
NK002(kha)021:46: 'khor dang gdan 'od du zhu nas rang la thim /
NK002(kha)021:47: rang gi gnas gsum du +aahmh'u gis mtshan par bsam /
NK002(kha)021:48: dge ba 'di yis myur du bdag /
NK002(kha)021:49: sangs rgyas sman bla 'grub gyur nas //
NK002(kha)021:51: bsnyen pa byed na khrus dang gtsang sbra la gnas
NK002(kha)021:52: pas gzungs thung 'bum phrag gcig kha skong dang bcas
NK002(kha)021:53: pa bzla / thun mtshams su phyag mchod rgyas bsdu gang rigs sam /
NK002(kha)021:54: sman mdo che chung ji ltar nus pa bklag par bya'o //
NK002(kha)021:55: zhes pa'ang nyer mkho'i slad du mang du thos pa'i bya bral ba many+dzu g+ho shas sbyar ba ste /
NK002(kha)021:56: dge bas 'gro kun phan bde'i rgyur gyur cig //
